Module takMashido.shani
Package takMashido.shani.tools.parsers

Class IntValueParser

java.lang.Object
takMashido.shani.tools.parsers.IntValueParser
public class IntValueParser
extends java.lang.Object
Changes int value to it's representation string. Eg. 1 into "minute", 2 into "2 minutes". Based on date from initialing xml Node.
Data are stored in following form: 

<root>
 	<strict>
		<_1>godzina</_1>
		<_12-14>godzin</_12-14>
	</strict>
	<lastDigit>
		<_0-1>godzin</_0-1>
		<_2-4>godziny</_2-4>
		<_5-9>godzin</_5-9>
	</lastDigit>
 </root>
"strict" sub tag contain replacers values exactly in given range and under "lastDigit" tag takes into account only last decimal digit of number.
Names of second level tags are in following form: "_number" or "_min-max". There are matching single number or numbers in given inclusive range. It's text content is added after the number with one exception, if tag matches exactly one number original int value is skipped in returned string. Supports also multiple replacers under one tag in ShaniString manner, with '*' between substrings.
E.g. with given initializing node 14 passed in parse(int) method returns "14 godzin", 1 returns "godzina" and 22 "22 godziny".
Author:
TakMashido
